item.title: Espresso Science Everywhere
item.description: It has been over a month now since my google, youtube and other social media or news feeds started showing articles by news magazines or papers or blogs about how we were all, as a species, brewing espresso wrongly and that scientists have finally figured out the perfect way to brew a good cup of coffee. Apparently Brewing Espresso Better involves grinding coarser, with less coffee (15 grams seems to be the accepted amount) and brewing it for half the time one typically would.
